invite.title: Invite Friends
invite.description: Invite friends to Oazo and receive a bonus.
invite.pageDescription: Invite friends to Oazo Homes. You can still invite {remaining, plural, =1{1 person} other{# people}}.
invite.formDescription: Let friends join Oazo before they invite others.
invite.messagePlaceholder: Hello! I thought you would love Oazo. It's a great platform for unique accommodations...
invite.step1Description: Send a personal invitation to your friends.
invite.step2Description: Your friend receives an email and can register.
invite.step3Description: Once your friend makes their first booking, you receive a bonus.
invite.sentInvitesDescription: Here you can see all your sent invitations and their status.

goodToKnow.title: Good to Know
goodToKnow.description: Please provide a few points that tenants should know
goodToKnow.placeholder: e.g. the swimming pool is not very large / the nearest restaurants are 2km away / you will need a car to explore the area / etc.
goodToKnow.emptyError: Good to know cannot be empty
goodToKnow.helpText: A good to know point builds trust and gives your accommodation a personal touch.

arrivalInformationPublic.title: Location & Arrival
arrivalInformationPublic.description: Describe the location and add general arrival information (please do not provide address data or details).
arrivalInformationPublic.placeholder: Describe the location and general arrival information for guests...
arrivalInformationPublic.helpText: Rough directions help guests plan their arrival.
arrivalInformationPublic.emptyError: Location & Arrival information cannot be empty

description.title: Description
description.detailDescription: Describe your accommodation and what makes it special.
description.placeholder: Tell your guests what makes your accommodation special. Describe the location, amenities and what guests can expect...
description.helpText: A good description helps guests understand if your accommodation is right for them.

quote.title: Host Quote
quote.detailDescription: Share a personal quote or message with your guests.
quote.placeholder: e.g. Welcome to our cozy home! We're excited to show you our favorite place...
quote.helpText: A personal quote builds trust and gives your accommodation a personal touch.

tips.title: Tips
tips.detailDescription: Share helpful tips and local recommendations with your guests.
tips.placeholder: e.g. Recommended restaurants nearby, local insider tips, public transportation...
tips.helpText: Helpful tips make your guests' stay unforgettable.

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellationPolicy.detailDescription: Oazo offers you 3 types of cancellation options. Choose the one you feel most comfortable with.

address.title: Address
address.detailDescription: Enter the address of your accommodation. The exact address will only be shown to guests after booking.

todo.description: Add your bank account to receive payments.

done.description: Your bank account is connected. You can now accept bookings.

bankAccount.detailDescription: Add your bank account to receive payments.

pending.title: Connecting...

countrySelection.label: Country of your bank account
countrySelection.note: If your country is not in the list, it is not yet supported. <supportLink>Contact support</supportLink> for more information.

existing.title: Connected

bankAccount.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
bankAccount.noCountrySet: You have not set a country in your profile. Please add a country to setup your bank account.

bedRooms.title: Sleeping Options
bedRooms.detailDescription: Please add the rooms with an image of the sleeping options

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.detailDescription: You have 48 hours to respond to a booking request. Enable SMS notifications so you never miss a request.
notifications.smsOnNewBookingDescription: Receive an SMS when a guest submits a booking request.
notifications.noVerifiedPhone: Verify your phone number in your <accountLink>account settings</accountLink> to enable SMS notifications.

publication.readyDescription: Your accommodation is complete and can be published.
publication.notReadyDescription: Your accommodation will not appear in search results and cannot be booked. Complete your information and publish your accommodation to accept bookings.
publication.incompleteAlert: You can only list your accommodation once you have completed all the information in the accommodation
publication.activeDescription: Your listing appears in search results and can be booked by guests.
publication.inactiveDescription: Your listing does not appear in search results and cannot be booked. You can pause your accommodation.

review.requestReviewDescription: Submit your listing for review before it can be published.
review.readyForReviewDescription: Your listing is complete and can be submitted for review.
review.inReviewDescription: Your listing is currently being reviewed by our team. You will be notified once the review is complete.
review.approved: Your listing has been approved! You can now publish it.
review.rejectedDescription: Your listing was rejected. Please revise it and submit again.

toast.requestSuccess: Your listing has been submitted for review

PropertyStaySettings.title: Stay Settings
PropertyStaySettings.description: Here the stay settings for your accommodation are managed. This feature will be available soon and will help you optimize your guests' experience.

whyImportant.title: Why these settings are important
whyImportant.description: Clear stay guidelines help your guests feel comfortable and ensure a smooth experience.

checkinCheckout.title: Check-In & Check-Out Times
checkinCheckout.detailDescription: Set the check-in and check-out times for your guests.

CheckinMethodSection.title: Check-In Method
CheckinMethodSection.description: Describe how guests can check in
CheckinMethodSection.detailDescription: Explain to your guests step by step how the check-in process works.
CheckinMethodSection.placeholder: Describe how guests should check in...
CheckinMethodSection.helpText: Give clear instructions for a smooth check-in.

CheckoutMethodSection.title: Check-Out Method
CheckoutMethodSection.description: Describe how guests should check out
CheckoutMethodSection.detailDescription: Explain to your guests what to consider during check-out.
CheckoutMethodSection.placeholder: Describe how guests should check out...
CheckoutMethodSection.helpText: Give clear instructions for a smooth check-out.

PropertyDescriptionSection.title: Directions
PropertyDescriptionSection.description:
Please provide detailed directions on how to get there and, if known, the geographical coordinates (latitude and longitude).
As links cannot be inserted, all information should be included in the text.
This information will be sent to your guests by email before their arrival.
PropertyDescriptionSection.detailDescription: Help your guests find your accommodation easily.
PropertyDescriptionSection.placeholder: Add directions and arrival information for guests...
PropertyDescriptionSection.helpText: Detailed instructions help guests with arrival.

WifiAccessSection.title: WiFi Access Details
WifiAccessSection.description: Provide WiFi network name and password for guests
WifiAccessSection.detailDescription: Give your guests all the necessary information for WiFi access.
WifiAccessSection.placeholder:
Network name: MyWiFi
Password: password123
Additional instructions...
WifiAccessSection.helpText: Clear WiFi information improves the guest experience.

HouseRulesSection.title: House Rules
HouseRulesSection.description: Set clear rules and expectations for your guests
HouseRulesSection.detailDescription: Define important rules for harmonious coexistence.
HouseRulesSection.placeholder:
• No smoking
• No pets
• Quiet hours: 10:00 PM - 8:00 AM
• Maximum 4 guests...
HouseRulesSection.helpText: Clear house rules create a pleasant environment for everyone.
